channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: I saw a man walking up Ormiston Road carrying an airer and noticed it was bent. A short time later I walked down Kemsing Road and noticed the airer had been abandoned in the street., 6th November
item.description:
The airer had been there for three days now.

item.title: Rubbish bag by lamp post at 9pm from 83 great Titchfield street, 6th November
item.description:
3 bags dumped by cleaner at 9pm collection will not happen this evening, not sure why businesses are allowed to leave bags out in this street for hours and sometimes days , can the WCC speak with the businesses, thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Gosfield Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster

item.title: Missed communal bins collection, 6th November
item.description:
4 blue communal bins at Ian Court SE23 2PB not emptied on Tuesday 4 Nov 2025. Reported to Lewisham Council Reference CAS-4419653-Q9Z5N8 that afternoon at the time suggested on the webpage. No resulting action. All four bins now full to the brim, two have lids poking up. No space for the weekend's rubbish.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ian Court, Forest Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Request for zebra crossing outside school, 6th November
item.description:
Would it be possible for the council to consider installing a zebra crossing and dropped curbs to Church Road, immediately outside Uplands School? At peak times, it is quite dangerous to cross with children, especially when travelling with a buggy, or toddlers on scooters. This is not helped by parents parking in no parking zones.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Report of Illegal Waste Dumping (Fly-tipping, 6th November
item.description:
On Thursday, 6 November, at around 19:09, a van with the registration number BG09 HFA was seen dumping rubbish on the street near postcode SE7 8NF. The driver stopped the vehicle and disposed of waste illegally on the public road, causing litter and an environmental hazard. Please investigate this incident and take any appropriate action.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Lydenburg Street, Charlton Riverside, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface is crumbling onto the pavement, 6th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Belvedere Road, London

item.title: Pitch black streets unsafe - no lights, 6th November
item.description:
No street lighting is working the entire length of Molesworth St and part of Lewisham High Street making it very unsafe for females to walk home alone after work in the early evening when it's pitch black already. It's been this way for weeks, is our safety not important? There have been many stabbings in the local area these past few weeks. Please make the area as safe as you can - lights are a basic thing we should have.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 207, Lewisham High Street, Ladywell, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: All out - three or more street lights in a row
